lowCode.challenge: The company needed a modern low-code platform that would allow business users to build financial applications without deep technical knowledge. The existing tools were outdated, hard to maintain, and lacked the flexibility required for complex financial workflows.
lowCode.solution: I led the frontend development of the platform, designing and implementing a comprehensive component library from scratch. The architecture focused on reusability, accessibility, and performance, allowing users to drag-and-drop pre-built widgets to create sophisticated applications.
lowCode.results: The platform now powers multiple enterprise clients, reducing application development time by 60%. The component library has grown to 75+ widgets with 95% test coverage, and the team has expanded while maintaining code quality through the patterns and documentation I established.
highlights: Designed and developed 75+ reusable Angular widgets from scratch
Established component architecture patterns adopted across the organization
Mentored 2 junior developers, improving team velocity by 25%
Achieved 95% test coverage with comprehensive unit and E2E tests
Migrated CI/CD pipelines to cloud, reducing build times by 65%
Created extensive documentation and Storybook stories for all components

pijiz.challenge: The client needed a professional e-commerce store that could handle multiple languages, integrate various payment methods, and rank well on search engines. The store had to be easy to manage and reflect the brand's modern aesthetic.
pijiz.solution: Built a custom Shopify store with a tailored theme that matched the brand identity. Implemented multi-language support for international customers, integrated local and international payment gateways, and optimized every page for SEO including meta tags, structured data, and page speed.
pijiz.results: The store launched successfully with a 40% improvement in page load times compared to the original template. The SEO optimizations led to first-page Google rankings for key product terms within 3 months of launch.
highlights: Built custom Shopify theme matching brand identity
Integrated multiple payment gateways including local options
Optimized page speed scoring 90+ on Google PageSpeed
Set up Google Analytics and conversion tracking
Configured custom domain and professional email

banking.challenge: A major banking application was running on Angular v11, which was approaching end-of-life. The codebase had accumulated technical debt, custom themes that weren't compatible with newer Angular versions, and the team needed to modernize without disrupting ongoing development.
banking.solution: Led a phased migration strategy that allowed the team to continue feature development while upgrading. Refactored legacy modules to use modern Angular patterns, migrated the custom theme system to CSS variables for better maintainability, and updated all dependencies systematically.
banking.results: Successfully upgraded to Angular v16 with zero production incidents. Build times improved by 45%, and the modernized codebase enabled the team to implement new features 30% faster. The migration also resolved 50+ long-standing bugs related to the outdated framework.
highlights: Led full framework migration from Angular v11 to v16
Refactored legacy modules to modern Angular patterns
Migrated custom theme system to CSS variables
Achieved zero production incidents during migration
